name: exp_package_test_v1
description: A simple package ready for npm

scripts.release:patch:
npm version patch -m "Publish (v%s)

 - exp_package_test_v1@%s" && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor:
npm version minor -m "Publish (v%s)

 - exp_package_test_v1@%s" && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major:
npm version major -m "Publish (v%s)

 - exp_package_test_v1@%s" && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha:
npm version prerelease --preid=alpha -m "Publish (v%s)

 - exp_package_test_v1@%s" && npm publish --tag alpha && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha:new:
npm version pre patch --preid=alpha -m "Publish (v%s)

 - exp_package_test_v1@%s" && npm publish --tag alpha && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta:
npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "Publish (v%s)

 - exp_package_test_v1@%s" && npm publish --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:rc:
npm version prerelease --preid=rc -m "Publish (v%s)

 - exp_package_test_v1@%s" && npm publish --tag rc && git push && git push --tags
